languages.text: "В этой мрачной готовности погибнуть есть даже капля достоинства".
"There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."
languages.original_text: "В этой мрачной готовности погибнуть есть даже капля достоинства".

traits.locale_text: "There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."
"There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."
"There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."
"There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."

languages.text: “做好准备，面对严峻的死亡。从某种角度来说，这确实很有尊严。”
languages.original_text: "There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."

traits.locale_text: “做好准备，面对严峻的死亡。从某种角度来说，这确实很有尊严。”

languages.text: «Hay algo digno en esta sombría disposición a morir».
languages.original_text: "There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."

traits.locale_text: «Hay algo digno en esta sombría disposición a morir».

languages.text: 「お前ら死に対する覚悟には、ある種の高貴ささえ感じられる」
languages.original_text: "There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."

traits.locale_text: 「お前ら死に対する覚悟には、ある種の高貴ささえ感じられる」

languages.text: "Diese düstere Bereitschaft zu sterben, hat durchaus etwas Würdevolles."
languages.original_text: "There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."

traits.locale_text: "Diese düstere Bereitschaft zu sterben, hat durchaus etwas Würdevolles."

languages.text: « Je vois une certaine dignité à accepter aussi sombrement la mort. »
languages.original_text: "There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois une certaine dignité à accepter aussi sombrement la mort. »

languages.text: "Ölüme hazır olmanın bu kasvetinde bir nebze haysiyet yatıyor."
languages.original_text: "There is actually something dignified about this grim readiness to die."

traits.locale_text: "Ölüme hazır olmanın bu kasvetinde bir nebze haysiyet yatıyor."
